statements: UPDATE SupplyChainData SET supplier_name='ABC Suppliers', supplier_location='New York' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE SupplyChainData SET carbon_footprint=15.75, product_name='New Product' WHERE id=3;
UPDATE SupplyChainData SET carbon_footprint = 15.50 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE SupplyChainData SET supplier_location = 'New York', carbon_footprint = 20.75, supplier_name = 'XYZ Suppliers' WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE supply_chain_optimization SET carbon_footprint = 5.75 WHERE product_name = 'Laptop' AND supplier_name = 'TechSupplier';
UPDATE sustainability_metrics SET waste_reduction = 0.25, energy_consumption = 350.5 WHERE company_name = 'GreenTech Inc.';
UPDATE supply_chain_optimization SET carbon_footprint = 5.67 WHERE id = 'f4808351-3476-4db2-a348-4744b9a6c61e';
UPDATE sustainability_metrics SET energy_consumption = 100.25, waste_reduction = 15.3 WHERE company_name = 'ABC Company';
UPDATE Product SET price = 29.99, quantity = 100 WHERE product_id = 101;
UPDATE Shipment SET delivery_status = 'Delivered', quantity_sent = 50 WHERE shipment_id = 201;
UPDATE Product SET price = 15.99, quantity = quantity + 10 WHERE product_id = 123;
UPDATE Shipment SET quantity_sent = 100, delivery_status = 'Delivered' WHERE supplier_id = 456 AND shipment_date > '2022-01-01';
UPDATE suppliers SET email='newemail@example.com', address='123 Main Street' WHERE supplier_id=1;
UPDATE products SET price=15.99, category='Electronics' WHERE product_id=101;
UPDATE suppliers SET supplier_name = 'Updated Supplier Name' WHERE supplier_id = 1;
UPDATE products SET price = 25.99, supplier_id = 2 WHERE product_id = 5;
UPDATE SustainabilityMetrics SET target_value = 75 WHERE metric_id = 1;
UPDATE ProductInfo SET unit_price = 29.99 WHERE product_id = 5;
UPDATE SustainabilityMetrics SET target_value = 150.00 WHERE metric_id = 1;
UPDATE ProductInfo SET unit_price = 25.99, product_category = 'Electronics' WHERE product_id = 101;
